SENT.plain: We report on a newborn male infant who presented the typical findings of achondrogenesis type II (Langer-Saldino), and who also showed postaxial polydactyly on both feet and bilateral microtia
Polydactyly is frequently part of the short-rib syndromes, but has not been reported in achondrogenesis
The hypothesis of polydactyly as part of a contiguous gene syndrome is discussed
